entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 2:30 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -13.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -19.9°C
Wind: SW 78 km/h gust 104 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas this evening. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the morning then rising. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
